entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
